tool_description: Help users find literatures/articles/papers on the pubmed server. The user needs to specify the keywords, start date, end date, and maximum number of items to be searched. This tool will help the user search literatures/articles/papers on the pubmed database and return the search results.

required_parameters.name: keywords
required_parameters.description: A term to search within all articles on pubmed server.

optional_parameters.name: max_papers
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of articles you want to get. Default is 25.

optional_parameters.name: start_date
optional_parameters.description: The date from which you want to start searching for articles. Use format "yyyy-mm-dd", e.g., "2024-03-19". Default(empty input) is 3 years ago from today. The start date must be the same or earlier than the end date.

optional_parameters.name: end_date
optional_parameters.description: The date up to which you want to search for articles. Use format "yyyy-mm-dd", e.g., "2024-03-19". Default(empty input) is today's date.

return_values.name: search_result
return_values.description: The results of the user's search for articles. Including the title, publication date, link and doi information of the articles.
